description:
It`s summer vacation! The first-years get to board a luxury cruise ship, where they`re allowed to sample the highest class facilities available.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abandon All Hope, Ye Who Enter Here.
Nandachi Koko ni Hairu Mono, Issai no Nozomi o Sute yo.
Vous qui entrez laissez toute espérance.
أنت يا من يدخل إلى هنا، افقد كلّ الأمل
汝等ここに入るもの, 一切の望みを捨てよ.
여기 들어오는 자, 모든 희망을 버려라
